QuestData.Title: Kill the Kritch
QuestData.Description:
Mrgglrr! Mrlg rmglr grlmrrgrr, grmm mrgl grrmrrgllrr.
<Rlgmrr jumps around anxiously and points toward the cave.>
Grrmrlgr mrg lrglgllmrrglm mlr mrlglmrgm mrl Kriiitchrglgr.
<He makes a scary face and pinching motions with his hands.>
Mrglrmgr lrg, mrgglmmmr! Mrlg grrrrml lrg.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Self-proclaimed and merciless ruler of Deepwater Cavern.
